name: Project Karta S
description:
Hello there! This is a prototype of my upcoming project, codename Karta S. It's just a quick test of base mechanics that I will expand upon in the upcoming weeks. You can play it here in a browser or download a Windows app, hope you have fun!

Warning! The game has a basic save/load functionality now, if it doesn't work in browser please download the .exe version

Join the Discord
Support on Patreon
